interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pure Active Body Cleansing Shower Wipes, 40 Individually Wrapped Reduced Price Personal Hygiene Body Wipes for Women and Men, XL, Extra Moist for After Gym Travel Camping Outdoors Sports
Review Date: 2020/08/22
Store: Pure Active
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Active', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '40.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '8.39 x 6.81 x 6.57 inches; 2.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '613497909697'}
Review Text: The Covid answer to post gym workouts!  If I were a gym owner,  I would keep these well in stock! This is a nice big cloth, used to clean up after a workout. It is not dripping wet but it is adequately moist. There is a slight clean scent to it, but nothing perfumy or anything that would fight with a perfume. It did a nice job, however other than doing may be under arms face and chest one of these towels would not be enough if you really wanted to clean yourself up.  These would also be great during camping trips. Or even long car trips when you like to refresh. For what it is, I don’t think the price is unreasonable. If I were a gym owner I would give each patron two of these towels when they arrived. I thought the product was good, the towel was really soft and enjoyable to use.  The towel itself is also as strong as it is soft. I will make sure to have a couple of these in my purse at all times.
Review Title: The Covid answer to post gym workouts!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Natural Solution
['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
Not great for exfoliating, but a pleasant experience.  All the salt in this product is less than I would’ve expected and very fine grained so the exfoliation experience isn’t what I expected. What I did like about it was it was not as oily as many of the products that I’ve had in the past. It did leave my skin feeling soft and refreshed. And I do think the price is very reasonable for the quality of the ingredients that are in it. I took one star off for the misrepresentation of the exfoliation product.
Not great for exfoliating, but a pleasant experience
2oz / 60ml Glass Spray Bottles for DIY Refill, Essential Oils, Pillow Mists,Fine Mist Spray -3Packs Amber Color
EagleKing
{'Brand': 'EagleKing', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 6.1 x 1.7 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
Sturdy components, good quality glass bottle, sprays a perfect super fine mist.  No complaint at all about the quality, the price...a bit steep even for this quality but I don't find it obscene, hence only one star removed.
Good quality
Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz)
Argan Magic
{'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'}
I don't think there is a part of your body that wouldn't benefit from this oil.  I use it on my hair, and mix a bit in my conditioner.  Great for the skin and especially the face.  I also use it for dried cuticles.  Perfect size.
Love this oil!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences**: The user continues to favor natural skincare solutions with organic ingredients that are moisturizing and nourishing. They have recently developed a preference for versatile oils for added hydration and practical personal hygiene products.
- **Exfoliation Experience**: They prioritize overall texture and feel when exfoliating, seeking pleasant experiences over aggressive scrubbing.
- **Sensory Feedback**: The user prefers lighter formulations that leave the skin and hair feeling soft and refreshed, with a notable appreciation for non-greasy moisturizers.
- **Value Sensitivity**: They value high-quality ingredients at reasonable prices and are willing to invest in quality products while remaining cautious of steep pricing.
- **General Discontent with Expectations**: The user is critical of products that do not meet their expectations, especially regarding effectiveness and performance.
- **Compatibility**: They seek inclusivity in their skincare choices, favoring products suitable for all skin types.
- **Moderate Ratings**: The user rates products moderately based on overall experiences, balancing performance and sensory satisfaction.
- **Practicality in Purchases**: They have shown a penchant for practical and versatile products, as seen in their interest in effective hygiene solutions that are suitable for active lifestyles, including gym and outdoor use.

Overall, the user leans towards effective, reasonably priced natural skincare and personal hygiene products, values enjoyable sensory experiences, and maintains a practical approach in their purchases.
